page.title: 04COMMUNITY C. BLACKBURN 2
page.content: NURSERY The centre offers nursery accommodation for twenty four children. There are four teachers who encourage the development of basic English, painting, drawing, sticking & singing. CRECHE There is a creche for the children of visitors. It costs 10p. per child, the children are able to play with toys suchas jig-saws and slides. YOUTH CLUB There is a club for boys/girls aged 10 - 18. It offers facilities for playing snooker, table-tennis, football, netball, and rounders. There is an outdoor all weather pitch. There is also a disco catering for 50-100, 13/18 boys/girls. VIDEO ROOM -For making community films. SEWING CLASSES -For Asian ladies. JUNIOR SCHOOL -1985/86, 150 pupils.
